desc: Shop our Hasco Imports warehouse items online. Can't find what you're looking for? Import items & goods from the U.S. to Bermuda with our Custom Imports Services. Let us be your personal overseas shopper. We can help you source any item and ship it in.

layout.text: Import items from the U.S. to Bermuda. Let us be your personal overseas shopper! We can help you source any item and ship it in.
